data.title: Jesuit Spiritual Center at Milford – A Catholic Retreat Center located in Milford Ohio.
data.meta_description: We are a Catholic Ministry, sponsored by the Society of Jesus, offering Ignatian spiritual formation, retreats, and sacred space for all those seeking a deeper relationship with God. Retreats In order to bring spiritual refreshment to an even greater number of people, the Jesuit Spiritual Center offers a wide variety of retreats, such as one-day…
data.text:
Retreats

In order to bring spiritual refreshment to an even greater number of people, the Jesuit Spiritual Center offers a wide variety of retreats, such as one-day retreats, weekend retreats, and even week-long personally directed retreats.

Youth Ministry

For over 70 years, the Jesuit Spiritual Center’s Youth Ministry Team has been committed to offering transformational retreat experiences in the Jesuit tradition. Today we serve over 7,000 young people on over 70 retreats each year, on and off campus.

Accommodations

The Jesuit Spiritual Center's campus in Milford, Ohio, is located on a beautiful 37 acres alongside the Little Miami River. Three Retreat Houses of varying sizes and styles, the Splain Cabin, and the Pavilion are all available as rental spaces.
